questions.question: Could you describe the approximate location of Magadan based on its latitude and longitude?
What is the approximate latitude of Magadan?
What is the approximate longitude of Magadan?
What are the geographic coordinates of Magadan?
Approximately how many degrees north is Magadan located from the equator?
In which hemisphere is Magadan located?
Is Magadan located closer to the North Pole or the equator?
How far east is Magadan from the Prime Meridian?

What can you infer about the climate of Magadan based on its location?
